mapper.select: SELECT REQ_ID, DOC_NO, MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM, ADMISSION_YYYY, ADMISSION_MM, ADMISSION_DD, QUIT_YYYY, QUIT_MM, QUIT_DD, POSITION_CODE, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD, ADVISING_DOCTOR, COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY, COACHING_ACQUISI_MM, COACHING_ACQUISI_DD, COACHING_ST_YYYY, COACHING_ST_MM, COACHING_ST_DD, COACHING_ED_YYYY, COACHING_ED_MM, COACHING_ED_DD, CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN, CERTIFY_ST_YYYY, CERTIFY_ST_MM, CERTIFY_ST_DD, CERTIFY_ED_YYYY, CERTIFY_ED_MM, CERTIFY_ED_DD, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID FROM T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId} AND MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM = #{medicalSocietyNm}

SELECT REQ_ID, DOC_NO, MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM, ADMISSION_YYYY, ADMISSION_MM, ADMISSION_DD, QUIT_YYYY, QUIT_MM, QUIT_DD, POSITION_CODE, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD, ADVISING_DOCTOR, COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY, COACHING_ACQUISI_MM, COACHING_ACQUISI_DD, COACHING_ST_YYYY, COACHING_ST_MM, COACHING_ST_DD, COACHING_ED_YYYY, COACHING_ED_MM, COACHING_ED_DD, CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN, CERTIFY_ST_YYYY, CERTIFY_ST_MM, CERTIFY_ST_DD, CERTIFY_ED_YYYY, CERTIFY_ED_MM, CERTIFY_ED_DD, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID FROM T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId} AND MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM = #{medicalSocietyNm} FOR UPDATE

SELECT REQ_ID, DOC_NO, MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM, ADMISSION_YYYY, ADMISSION_MM, ADMISSION_DD, QUIT_YYYY, QUIT_MM, QUIT_DD, POSITION_CODE, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD, ADVISING_DOCTOR, COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY, COACHING_ACQUISI_MM, COACHING_ACQUISI_DD, COACHING_ST_YYYY, COACHING_ST_MM, COACHING_ST_DD, COACHING_ED_YYYY, COACHING_ED_MM, COACHING_ED_DD, CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN, CERTIFY_ST_YYYY, CERTIFY_ST_MM, CERTIFY_ST_DD, CERTIFY_ED_YYYY, CERTIFY_ED_MM, CERTIFY_ED_DD, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID FROM T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ ORDER BY REQ_ID, MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ(REQ_ID, DOC_NO, MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM, ADMISSION_YYYY, ADMISSION_MM, ADMISSION_DD, QUIT_YYYY, QUIT_MM, QUIT_DD, POSITION_CODE, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD, ADVISING_DOCTOR, COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY, COACHING_ACQUISI_MM, COACHING_ACQUISI_DD, COACHING_ST_YYYY, COACHING_ST_MM, COACHING_ST_DD, COACHING_ED_YYYY, COACHING_ED_MM, COACHING_ED_DD, CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN, CERTIFY_ST_YYYY, CERTIFY_ST_MM, CERTIFY_ST_DD, CERTIFY_ED_YYYY, CERTIFY_ED_MM, CERTIFY_ED_DD, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID) VALUES (#{reqId}, #{docNo}, #{medicalSocietyNm}, #{admissionYYYY}, #{admissionMM}, #{admissionDD}, #{quitYYYY}, #{quitMM}, #{quitDD}, #{positionCode}, #{societyPosiStYYYY}, #{societyPosiStMM}, #{societyPosiStDD}, #{societyPosiEdYYYY}, #{societyPosiEdMM}, #{societyPosiEdDD}, #{advisingDoctorCd}, #{coachingAcquisiYYYY}, #{coachingAcquisiMM}, #{coachingAcquisiDD}, #{coachingStYYYY}, #{coachingStMM}, #{coachingStDD}, #{coachingEdYYYY}, #{coachingEdMM}, #{coachingEdDD}, #{certifyingPhysicianCd}, #{certifyStYYYY}, #{certifyStMM}, #{certifyStDD}, #{certifyEdYYYY}, #{certifyEdMM}, #{certifyEdDD}, #{insShaYmd}, #{insShaId}, #{updShaYmd}, #{updShaId})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ SET DOC_NO = #{update.docNo},DOC_NO = NULL,ADMISSION_YYYY = #{update.admissionYYYY},ADMISSION_YYYY = NULL,ADMISSION_MM = #{update.admissionMM},ADMISSION_MM = NULL,ADMISSION_DD = #{update.admissionDD},ADMISSION_DD = NULL,QUIT_YYYY = #{update.quitYYYY},QUIT_YYYY = NULL,QUIT_MM = #{update.quitMM},QUIT_MM = NULL,QUIT_DD = #{update.quitDD},QUIT_DD = NULL,POSITION_CODE = #{update.positionCode},POSITION_CODE = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY = #{update.societyPosiStYYYY},SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM = #{update.societyPosiStMM},SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD = #{update.societyPosiStDD},SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY = #{update.societyPosiEdYYYY},SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM = #{update.societyPosiEdMM},SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD = #{update.societyPosiEdDD},SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD = NULL,ADVISING_DOCTOR = #{update.advisingDoctorCd},ADVISING_DOCTOR = NULL,COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY = #{update.coachingAcquisiYYYY},COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY = NULL,COACHING_ACQUISI_MM = #{update.coachingAcquisiMM},COACHING_ACQUISI_MM = NULL,COACHING_ACQUISI_DD = #{update.coachingAcquisiDD},COACHING_ACQUISI_DD = NULL,COACHING_ST_YYYY = #{update.coachingStYYYY},COACHING_ST_YYYY = NULL,COACHING_ST_MM = #{update.coachingStMM},COACHING_ST_MM = NULL,COACHING_ST_DD = #{update.coachingStDD},COACHING_ST_DD = NULL,COACHING_ED_YYYY = #{update.coachingEdYYYY},COACHING_ED_YYYY = NULL,COACHING_ED_MM = #{update.coachingEdMM},COACHING_ED_MM = NULL,COACHING_ED_DD = #{update.coachingEdDD},COACHING_ED_DD = NULL,CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN = #{update.certifyingPhysicianCd},CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN = NULL,CERTIFY_ST_YYYY = #{update.certifyStYYYY},CERTIFY_ST_YYYY = NULL,CERTIFY_ST_MM = #{update.certifyStMM},CERTIFY_ST_MM = NULL,CERTIFY_ST_DD = #{update.certifyStDD},CERTIFY_ST_DD = NULL,CERTIFY_ED_YYYY = #{update.certifyEdYYYY},CERTIFY_ED_YYYY = NULL,CERTIFY_ED_MM = #{update.certifyEdMM},CERTIFY_ED_MM = NULL,CERTIFY_ED_DD = #{update.certifyEdDD},CERTIFY_ED_DD = NULL,INS_SHA_YMD = #{update.insShaYmd},INS_SHA_YMD = NULL,INS_SHA_ID = #{update.insShaId},INS_SHA_ID = NULL,UPD_SHA_YMD = #{update.updShaYmd},UPD_SHA_YMD = NULL,UPD_SHA_ID = #{update.updShaId},UPD_SHA_ID = NULL, WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId} AND MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM = #{medicalSocietyNm}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId} AND MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM = #{medicalSocietyNm}
mapper.select: SELECT SOC.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM -- 所属学会名称 , SOC.ADMISSION_YYYY -- 入会年月日(年) , SOC.ADMISSION_MM -- 入会年月日(月) , SOC.ADMISSION_DD -- 入会年月日(日) , SOC.QUIT_YYYY -- 脱会年月日(年) , SOC.QUIT_MM -- 脱会年月日(月) , SOC.QUIT_DD -- 脱会年月日(日) , SOC.POSITION_CODE -- 所属役職コード , NVL2(CDM.VALUE1_KANJ,CDM.VALUE1_KANJ,'--なし--') AS POSITION_NM -- 所属役職名称 , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY -- 役職開始年月日(年) , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM -- 役職開始年月日(月) , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD -- 役職開始年月日(日) , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY -- 役職終了年月日(年) , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM -- 役職終了年月日(月) , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD -- 役職終了年月日(日) , SOC.ADVISING_DOCTOR -- 所属学会指導医区分コード , CASE WHEN SOC.ADVISING_DOCTOR = '1' THEN '○' ELSE '×' END AS ADVISING_DOCTOR_NM -- 所属学会指導医区分名称 , SOC.COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY -- 指導医取得年月日(年) , SOC.COACHING_ACQUISI_MM -- 指導医取得年月日(月) , SOC.COACHING_ACQUISI_DD -- 指導医取得年月日(日) , SOC.COACHING_ST_YYYY -- 指導医開始年月日(年) , SOC.COACHING_ST_MM -- 指導医開始年月日(月) , SOC.COACHING_ST_DD -- 指導医開始年月日(日) , SOC.COACHING_ED_YYYY -- 指導医終了年月日(年) , SOC.COACHING_ED_MM -- 指導医終了年月日(月) , SOC.COACHING_ED_DD -- 指導医終了年月日(日) , SOC.CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN -- 所属学会認定医区分コード , CASE WHEN SOC.CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN = '1' THEN '○' ELSE '×' END AS CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN_NM -- 所属学会認定医区分名称 , SOC.CERTIFY_ST_YYYY -- 認定医開始年月日(年) , SOC.CERTIFY_ST_MM -- 認定医開始年月日(月) , SOC.CERTIFY_ST_DD -- 認定医開始年月日(日) , SOC.CERTIFY_ED_YYYY -- 認定医終了年月日(年) , SOC.CERTIFY_ED_MM -- 認定医終了年月日(月) , SOC.CERTIFY_ED_DD -- 認定医終了年月日(日) FROM T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ SOC -- 医師_所属学会_申請管理 LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDM -- コード情報 ON 1=1 AND CDM.CODE_NAME = 'POSITION_CODE' AND CDM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDM.VALUE1 = SOC.POSITION_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND SOC.REQ_ID = #{inReqId} ORDER BY SOC.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM
SELECT UPD_SHA_YMD ,UPD_SHA_ID FROM T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId} AND MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM = #{medicalSocietyNm} FOR UPDATE NOWAIT
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ SET DOC_NO = NULL,DOC_NO = #{docNo}, ADMISSION_YYYY = NULL,ADMISSION_YYYY = #{admissionYYYY}, ADMISSION_MM = NULL,ADMISSION_MM = #{admissionMM}, ADMISSION_DD = NULL,ADMISSION_DD = #{admissionDD}, QUIT_YYYY = NULL,QUIT_YYYY = #{quitYYYY}, QUIT_MM = NULL,QUIT_MM = #{quitMM}, QUIT_DD = NULL,QUIT_DD = #{quitDD}, POSITION_CODE = NULL,POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode}, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY = #{societyPosiStYYYY}, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM = #{societyPosiStMM}, SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD = #{societyPosiStDD}, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY = #{societyPosiEdYYYY}, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM = #{societyPosiEdMM}, SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD = NULL,SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD = #{societyPosiEdDD}, ADVISING_DOCTOR = NULL,ADVISING_DOCTOR = #{advisingDoctorCd}, COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY = NULL,COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY = #{coachingAcquisiYYYY}, COACHING_ACQUISI_MM = NULL,COACHING_ACQUISI_MM = #{coachingAcquisiMM}, COACHING_ACQUISI_DD = NULL,COACHING_ACQUISI_DD = #{coachingAcquisiDD}, COACHING_ST_YYYY = NULL,COACHING_ST_YYYY = #{coachingStYYYY}, COACHING_ST_MM = NULL,COACHING_ST_MM = #{coachingStMM}, COACHING_ST_DD = NULL,COACHING_ST_DD = #{coachingStDD}, COACHING_ED_YYYY = NULL,COACHING_ED_YYYY = #{coachingEdYYYY}, COACHING_ED_MM = NULL,COACHING_ED_MM = #{coachingEdMM}, COACHING_ED_DD = NULL,COACHING_ED_DD = #{coachingEdDD}, CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN = NULL,CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN = #{certifyingPhysicianCd}, CERTIFY_ST_YYYY = NULL,CERTIFY_ST_YYYY = #{certifyStYYYY}, CERTIFY_ST_MM = NULL,CERTIFY_ST_MM = #{certifyStMM}, CERTIFY_ST_DD = NULL,CERTIFY_ST_DD = #{certifyStDD}, CERTIFY_ED_YYYY = NULL,CERTIFY_ED_YYYY = #{certifyEdYYYY}, CERTIFY_ED_MM = NULL,CERTIFY_ED_MM = #{certifyEdMM}, CERTIFY_ED_DD = NULL,CERTIFY_ED_DD = #{certifyEdDD}, INS_SHA_YMD = NULL,INS_SHA_YMD = #{insShaYmd}, INS_SHA_ID = NULL,INS_SHA_ID = #{insShaId}, UPD_SHA_YMD = NULL,UPD_SHA_YMD = #{updShaYmd}, UPD_SHA_ID = NULLUPD_SHA_ID = #{updShaId} WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId} AND MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM = #{medicalSocietyNm}
mapper.select: SELECT SOC.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM -- 所属学会名称 , SOC.ADMISSION_YYYY -- 入会年月日(年) , SOC.ADMISSION_MM -- 入会年月日(月) , SOC.ADMISSION_DD -- 入会年月日(日) , SOC.QUIT_YYYY -- 脱会年月日(年) , SOC.QUIT_MM -- 脱会年月日(月) , SOC.QUIT_DD -- 脱会年月日(日) , SOC.POSITION_CODE -- 所属役職コード , NVL2(CDM.VALUE1_KANJ,CDM.VALUE1_KANJ,'--なし--') AS POSITION_NM -- 所属役職名称 , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY -- 役職開始年月日(年) , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM -- 役職開始年月日(月) , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD -- 役職開始年月日(日) , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY -- 役職終了年月日(年) , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM -- 役職終了年月日(月) , SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD -- 役職終了年月日(日) , SOC.ADVISING_DOCTOR -- 所属学会指導医区分コード , CASE WHEN SOC.ADVISING_DOCTOR = '1' THEN '○' ELSE '×' END AS ADVISING_DOCTOR_NM -- 所属学会指導医区分名称 , SOC.COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY -- 指導医取得年月日(年) , SOC.COACHING_ACQUISI_MM -- 指導医取得年月日(月) , SOC.COACHING_ACQUISI_DD -- 指導医取得年月日(日) , SOC.COACHING_ST_YYYY -- 指導医開始年月日(年) , SOC.COACHING_ST_MM -- 指導医開始年月日(月) , SOC.COACHING_ST_DD -- 指導医開始年月日(日) , SOC.COACHING_ED_YYYY -- 指導医終了年月日(年) , SOC.COACHING_ED_MM -- 指導医終了年月日(月) , SOC.COACHING_ED_DD -- 指導医終了年月日(日) , SOC.CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN -- 所属学会認定医区分コード , CASE WHEN SOC.CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN = '1' THEN '○' ELSE '×' END AS CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN_NM -- 所属学会認定医区分名称 , SOC.CERTIFY_ST_YYYY -- 認定医開始年月日(年) , SOC.CERTIFY_ST_MM -- 認定医開始年月日(月) , SOC.CERTIFY_ST_DD -- 認定医開始年月日(日) , SOC.CERTIFY_ED_YYYY -- 認定医終了年月日(年) , SOC.CERTIFY_ED_MM -- 認定医終了年月日(月) , SOC.CERTIFY_ED_DD -- 認定医終了年月日(日) FROM M_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY SOC -- 医師_所属学会情報 LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDM -- コード情報 ON 1=1 AND CDM.CODE_NAME = 'POSITION_CODE' AND CDM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDM.VALUE1 = SOC.POSITION_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND SOC.DOC_NO = #{inDocNo} ORDER BY SOC.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM

WITH KEYDATA AS ( SELECT DOC_NO , MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM , '0' AS UPD_FLG FROM M_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY SOC -- 医師_所属学会情報 WHERE DOC_NO = #{inDocNo} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM FROM T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ REQ -- 医師_所属学会_申請管理 WHERE REQ.REQ_ID = #{inReqId} AND REQ.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM = SOC.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM ) UNION SELECT DOC_NO , MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM , '1' AS UPD_FLG FROM T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ REQ -- 医師_所属学会_申請管理 WHERE DOC_NO = #{inDocNo} AND REQ_ID = #{inReqId} ) SELECT KEY.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM -- 所属学会名称 , NVL(REQ.ADMISSION_YYYY, SOC.ADMISSION_YYYY) AS ADMISSION_YYYY -- 入会年月日(年) , NVL(REQ.ADMISSION_MM, SOC.ADMISSION_MM) AS ADMISSION_MM -- 入会年月日(月) , NVL(REQ.ADMISSION_DD, SOC.ADMISSION_DD) AS ADMISSION_DD -- 入会年月日(日) , NVL(REQ.QUIT_YYYY, SOC.QUIT_YYYY) AS QUIT_YYYY -- 脱会年月日(年) , NVL(REQ.QUIT_MM, SOC.QUIT_MM) AS QUIT_MM -- 脱会年月日(月) , NVL(REQ.QUIT_DD, SOC.QUIT_DD) AS QUIT_DD -- 脱会年月日(日) , NVL(REQ.POSITION_CODE, SOC.POSITION_CODE) AS POSITION_CODE -- 所属役職コード , NVL2(CDM.VALUE1_KANJ,CDM.VALUE1_KANJ,'--なし--') AS POSITION_NM -- 所属役職名称 , NVL(REQ.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY, SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY) AS SOCIETY_POSI_ST_YYYY -- 役職開始年月日(年) , NVL(REQ.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM, SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM) AS SOCIETY_POSI_ST_MM -- 役職開始年月日(月) , NVL(REQ.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD, SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD) AS SOCIETY_POSI_ST_DD -- 役職開始年月日(日) , NVL(REQ.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY, SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY) AS SOCIETY_POSI_ED_YYYY -- 役職終了年月日(年) , NVL(REQ.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM, SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM) AS SOCIETY_POSI_ED_MM -- 役職終了年月日(月) , NVL(REQ.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD, SOC.SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD) AS SOCIETY_POSI_ED_DD -- 役職終了年月日(日) , NVL(REQ.ADVISING_DOCTOR, SOC.ADVISING_DOCTOR) AS ADVISING_DOCTOR -- 所属学会指導医区分コード , CASE WHEN NVL(REQ.ADVISING_DOCTOR, SOC.ADVISING_DOCTOR) = '1' THEN '○' ELSE '×' END AS ADVISING_DOCTOR_NM -- 所属学会指導医区分名称 , NVL(REQ.COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY, SOC.COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY) AS COACHING_ACQUISI_YYYY -- 指導医取得年月日(年) , NVL(REQ.COACHING_ACQUISI_MM, SOC.COACHING_ACQUISI_MM) AS COACHING_ACQUISI_MM -- 指導医取得年月日(月) , NVL(REQ.COACHING_ACQUISI_DD, SOC.COACHING_ACQUISI_DD) AS COACHING_ACQUISI_DD -- 指導医取得年月日(日) , NVL(REQ.COACHING_ST_YYYY, SOC.COACHING_ST_YYYY) AS COACHING_ST_YYYY -- 指導医開始年月日(年) , NVL(REQ.COACHING_ST_MM, SOC.COACHING_ST_MM) AS COACHING_ST_MM -- 指導医開始年月日(月) , NVL(REQ.COACHING_ST_DD, SOC.COACHING_ST_DD) AS COACHING_ST_DD -- 指導医開始年月日(日) , NVL(REQ.COACHING_ED_YYYY, SOC.COACHING_ED_YYYY) AS COACHING_ED_YYYY -- 指導医終了年月日(年) , NVL(REQ.COACHING_ED_MM, SOC.COACHING_ED_MM) AS COACHING_ED_MM -- 指導医終了年月日(月) , NVL(REQ.COACHING_ED_DD, SOC.COACHING_ED_DD) AS COACHING_ED_DD -- 指導医終了年月日(日) , NVL(REQ.CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN, SOC.CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN) AS CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN -- 所属学会認定医区分コード , CASE WHEN NVL(REQ.CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN, SOC.CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN) = '1' THEN '○' ELSE '×' END AS CERTIFYING_PHYSICIAN_NM -- 所属学会認定医区分名称 , NVL(REQ.CERTIFY_ST_YYYY, SOC.CERTIFY_ST_YYYY) AS CERTIFY_ST_YYYY -- 認定医開始年月日(年) , NVL(REQ.CERTIFY_ST_MM, SOC.CERTIFY_ST_MM) AS CERTIFY_ST_MM -- 認定医開始年月日(月) , NVL(REQ.CERTIFY_ST_DD, SOC.CERTIFY_ST_DD) AS CERTIFY_ST_DD -- 認定医開始年月日(日) , NVL(REQ.CERTIFY_ED_YYYY, SOC.CERTIFY_ED_YYYY) AS CERTIFY_ED_YYYY -- 認定医終了年月日(年) , NVL(REQ.CERTIFY_ED_MM, SOC.CERTIFY_ED_MM) AS CERTIFY_ED_MM -- 認定医終了年月日(月) , NVL(REQ.CERTIFY_ED_DD, SOC.CERTIFY_ED_DD) AS CERTIFY_ED_DD -- 認定医終了年月日(日) , KEY.UPD_FLG FROM KEYDATA KEY LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY SOC -- 医師_所属学会情報 ON 1=1 AND SOC.DOC_NO = KEY.DOC_NO AND SOC.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM = KEY.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM LEFT JOIN T_RDM_HCP_SOCIETY_REQ REQ -- 医師_所属学会_申請管理 ON 1=1 AND REQ.REQ_ID = #{inReqId} AND REQ.DOC_NO = KEY.DOC_NO AND REQ.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM = KEY.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDM -- コード情報 ON 1=1 AND CDM.CODE_NAME = 'POSITION_CODE' AND CDM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDM.VALUE1 = NVL(REQ.POSITION_CODE, SOC.POSITION_CODE) WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY KEY.MEDICAL_SOCIETY_NM
